name: AlloyMUX 2.2
short_description: AlloyMUX is an extension to the TinyMUX 2.2 Code. The original ideas behind AlloyMUX (formerly AlloyMUSH) are credited to Jesse McGrew (current contact information unknown). TinyMUX code provided by Stephen Dennis.
